ComicInfo.Title: No, Master
ComicInfo.Summary:
From creators Paolo Pantalena (Jirni) and Vince Hernandez (Fathom: Kiani) comes this all-new action-adventure series hundreds of years in the making! When the actions of her feudal lord begin to lay the seeds of doubt within her, , a samurai with exceptional swordplay and even far greater courage, must make a bold decision that forever changes her fate-along with the history of Japan itself! This special debut zero issue of ONIBA: SWORDS OF THE DEMON features a brand-new 12-page story that sets the stage for the upcoming premiere of ONIBA: SWORDS OF THE DEMON #1 coming next month! Also including a comprehensive sketchbook section and never before seen designs and artwork, make sure you don't miss out on ONIBA: SWORDS OF THE DEMON #0!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Paolo Pantalena & Sabine Rich | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Paolo Pantalena & Chuck Pires | 2 | C | 1:10 Limited Edition Retailer Incentive Cover | Mahmud A. Asrar | 3 | D | Stan Lee's Comikaze Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Paolo Pantalena | 4 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Akechi Mitsuhide, Oda Nobunaga, Toyotomi Hideyoshi, Yukiko
